title: Entry into effect of the cross-border merger
content: 201S. The cross border merger shall take effect from the date of its entry into effect which is determined in the decision made by the District Court in accordance with section 201R or where the authority competent to approve the completion of the cross border merger is the authority of another member state in accordance with the provisions of Article 11 of Directive 2005/56/EC the cross border merger shall commence to take effect on the date determined by the national legislation for the purposes of Article 12 of Directive 2005/56/EC. Registration. 2 of 186(I) of 2007.
